name: GECT Eurodistrict PAMINA
membership: Association of European Border Regions, Mission Opérationnelle Transfrontalière
goal: Promotion, support and coordination of cross-border cooperation in the Eurodistrict PAMINA (Southern Palatinate, Middle Upper Rhine, Northern Alsace)
interests: Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Overcoming legal and/or administrative obstacles in border regions
- ECBM-regulation (European Cross-Border Mechanism)
- Missing cross-border railway links
- INTERREG A, ETC and ERDF regulations post 2020
